DOC.brief_summary: The Digital Breast Tomosynthesis ( DBT ) Oslo Mammography Screening Program include woman age 50 69 year invite population-based mammography-screening program . All woman attend screen unit ask want attend trial . If , inform project , technique , additional compression radiation dose . All mammographic examination woman attend trial independently interpret four radiologist . The study include independent reading conventional digital ( 2D ) mammogram , 2D plus computer-aided detection ( CAD ) , 2D plus DBT , synthetic 2D plus DBT . There common consensus meeting examination positive score . Recalls diagnostic work-up accord daily practice Oslo University Hospital Ullevaal guideline NBCSP . Outcome measure use performance indicator organize screen program , include recall rate , false positive score , cancer detection rate , positive predictive value , cancer characteristic individual reader trial .
